author: Balakumar K
title: WhatsApp as an e-commerce platform gets unveiled
description: A business plan that brings together buyers, delivery partners and sellers on WhatsApp has been initiated by the Bengaluru civic body.
content:
Just yesterday the news was out that Facebook is investing $5.7 billion to pick up a 9.99% equity stake in India's Jio Platforms. Many wondered as to why Facebook was pumping in so much money in Reliance. 
The speculation is that the social networking giant … [+2968 chars]
